title: Understanding Lethality Assessment
text: A lethality assessment is a crucial tool used by mental health professionals. It helps in evaluating the risk factors associated with a person's potential for engaging in life-threatening behavior.

title: Components of Lethality Assessment
text: Consider the factors that might be evaluated during a lethality assessment. These could include the person's history, current mental state, and any expressed intentions or plans.
